title: Drawing, "Designs for Complimentary Set of Beauty Products, for Issey Miyake", n.d.
medium: Rollerball pen in black ink on white paper
signed: Singed in rollerball pen in black ink, upper right corner: Karim for Issey Miyake
inscribed: Inscribed in rollerball pen in black ink, upper edge:  The  Complimentary Set [underlined]/ for Issey Miyake; right side:  [arrow pointing down to left] Thread [underlined]/ [arrow pointing up to left] section [underlined]; center right:  single unit [underlined]; lower half, right:  [arrow pointing left] 20 mm [underlined]; [arrow pointing left] shorten lid/ [arrow pointing left] 0 mm.; lower half, near lower edge:  like Holiday Package * [underlined].
description: Three Nesting/ Stacking Low Bottles.  Alternative views showing single bottle in horizontal wavy shape, and working sketches showing how it fits with two other similarly shaped bottles; attention to dispenser size and threads.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Complimentary Set of Beauty Products, for Issey Miyake", n.d.. Rollerball pen in black ink on white paper. Gift of Karim Rashid. 2000-50-22.
